#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <assert.h>

int main() {
	int n, x;
	while (scanf("%d", &n) == 1) {
		int seg = 0, prev;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			scanf("%d", &x);
			assert(x == 0 || x == 1);
			if (i == 0 || x != prev)
				seg++;
			prev = x;
		}
		printf("%d\n", seg);
	}
	return 0;
}
/*
Sample Input
7
0 1 1 0 0 0 1

Sample Output
4
*/
